summary:
Tao Mu Jian & Chinese 9ring Broadsword by zsdreamer.
This is a standalone version.
descriptionHtml:
The two weapons were made by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3021851]zsdreamer[/url], with replacing other vanilla weapons.
I just make them standalone.

[b][color=DarkOrange][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3246/]Tao Mu Jian[/url][/color][/b](Peach Wood Sword): 
The definitive weapon used for demon exorcism during Taoist exorcism. The ones from Long Mountain in Jiangxi province are particularly valued as the premium quality peach wood swords.(From wiki)

Elven Craft

[b][color=DarkOrange][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5314/]Chinese 9ring Broadsword[/url][/color][/b]:
An ancient weapon in China.
Steel Craft
author: zsdreamer
